title: CatNip eSports - Top Lane Trials
body:
CatNip eSports (Old Napalm/Sapphire roster) is currently holding trials for a top laner. We are currently competing in the OOL and looking for a competitive challenger player.

We are looking for a player with the following attributes.
- Must be available to scrim weekly and be free on weekends for tournaments
- Friendly attitude
- Hard working
- Relevant champion pool
- Minimum rank diamond 3

Add me in game to organize a Trial

IGN: Wanted Man
